stages.name: Waking Up
stages.ai_opening: Good morning! Did you sleep well last night?
stages.learning_tip: 'I slept well' 또는 'I'm still tired'로 대답하세요
suggested_responses: Morning! I'm still a bit tired.
Hi! Yes, I had a good rest.

stages.name: Breakfast
suggested_responses: I'll have some toast and coffee.
I'm going to skip breakfast today.

stages.name: Daily Plans
stages.ai_prompt: Ask about plans for the day
suggested_responses: I have a meeting this morning.
I need to run some errands.
